overview: The plot revolves around four friends who make travel vlogs and they visit a place at the Dooars surrounded by jungle and hills for their next project and the story starts from here. The serene beauty leads to a journey of self-exploration for them and they rediscover the true meaning of life.
tagline: Inspired from Satyajit Ray's film and Sunil Gangopadhyay's novel
title: Awronner Din Ratri
